notes.body:
# Terminal Cheat Sheet

## adding to path

    $ PATH=/path/to/add:$PATH

## edit bash profile

    $ vim .bash_profile


## LESS

    $ autoless

$ zip -er name.zip folder


## tar
    
    tar -cvzf xcode.tar.gz ./Xcode.app/


## MOV to GIF Convert

    ffmpeg -i input.mov -vf scale=480:-1 -r 30 frames/ffout%03d.png
    convert -delay 3 -layers OptimizeFrame -loop 0 frames/ffout*.png output.gif


## CLEAR XCode CoreSimulator folder

    xcrun simctl delete unavailable
This is a deleted note. So sad :(
